hero.description: Train with me and benefit from the experience I’ve built through years of competing and structured training. You’ll get a personalized program, thoughtful competition preparation, and guidance throughout your journey toward your goals.

about.title: WORLD CHAMPION COACHING
about.subtitle: From World Champion to Your Coach
about.description1: As the current World's Strongest Man u90, I've experienced firsthand what it takes to stand at the top of the world stage. From grueling training cycles to the pressure of competition day, I understand every aspect of what makes a champion.
about.description2: With over 10 years of strongman training and 8+ years of competitive experience, I've accumulated more than 20 podium finishes including over 10 first place victories. I hold the u90 world record in log press along with multiple European, Nordic, and Swedish records.
about.description3: My approach combines proven training methodologies with individualized programming. Whether you're preparing for your first competition or chasing a world title, I'll help you build the strength, technique, and mindset to succeed.

services.title: COMPLETE COACHING
services.description: Everything you need to become a stronger, more competitive athlete. From programming to competition day, I've got you covered.

pricing.title: INVEST IN YOUR STRENGTH
pricing.note: All prices in EUR. At-competition coaching available based on location.

referrals.title: BE THE FIRST
referrals.ctaDescription: Be among the first to train with a world champion. Early clients receive personalized attention and can be featured here.

cta.description: Fill out my application form or book a free consultation.

footer.description: Professional strongman and strength coaching. Building champions through proven training methods and personalized programming.

booking.title: BOOK YOUR
booking.description: Select your preferred date and time, and I'll confirm your consultation within 24 hours.
booking.timezoneNote: Times shown in your local timezone ({{timezone}})
booking.goalsPlaceholder: What are you hoping to achieve? Any specific questions?
booking.trustNote: 100% free · No commitment · I'll confirm within 24 hours

validation.selectDateDesc: Choose your preferred consultation date from the calendar.

success.title: Request Submitted!
success.description: I'll get back to you within 24 hours to confirm your consultation time.

error.title: Something went wrong
error.description: Please try again or contact directly via email.

application.title: APPLY FOR COACHING
application.description: Complete this form to apply for coaching. I'll review your application and get back to you within 48 hours.

step2.title: Athletic Background
step2.trainingLevel: How would you describe your current training level?
step2.trainingHistory: What is your training history? (sports, lifting, etc.)
step2.hasWorkedWithCoach: Are you currently working with, or have you worked with, a coach before?
step2.coachExperience: If yes, what did you like or dislike?
step2.coachExperiencePlaceholder: Share your experience with previous coaches...

step3.title: Why You're Here
step3.whyWorkWithMe: Why do you want to work with me specifically?
step3.whyWorkWithMePlaceholder: What attracted you to my coaching?
step3.shortTermGoals: What are your short-term goals (3–6 months)?
step3.shortTermGoalsPlaceholder: What do you want to achieve in the next 3-6 months?
step3.longTermGoals: What are your long-term goals (1+ year)?
step3.longTermGoalsPlaceholder: Where do you see yourself in a year or more?
step3.motivationPlaceholder: What drives you to train and compete?

application.gdprConsent: I consent to being contacted and to my information being processed for coaching purposes.

validation.email: Please enter a valid email address
validation.hasWorkedWithCoach: Please indicate if you've worked with a coach

success.title: Thank you!
success.description: Your application has been received and will be reviewed. I'll get back to you within 48 hours.

error.title: Something went wrong
